Key Match Events: New York Knicks won against the Washington Wizards for the second straight game
The Knicks registered their season-best eighth consecutive win
Karl-Anthony Towns led all scorers in the game and registered another double-double performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Karl-Anthony Towns and his girlfriend, Jordyn Woods, visited the White House after the close win on Saturday
Others: Jalen Brunson added 18 points on Monday after scoring a season-high 55 points on Saturday
The Knicks will hope to register their ninth straight victory on Thursday as they host the visiting Utah Jazz
